name: Absorption K2
cardText: At the start of a contract, +1 Card if you have no Reactors in your hand.
wikiDescription: Absorption K2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Accelerator mk3
cardText: Your first Reactor played gives an extra Action.
wikiDescription: Accelerator mk3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Barrier A3
cardText: At the start of a contract, +1 Card if you have no Shields in your hand.
wikiDescription: Barrier A3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Cloaking Device
cardText: Roll 1 less Hazard Die
wikiDescription: Cloaking Device is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You can choose to not roll any [[Hazard Dice]] you have to roll, including those from contracts and abilities.

name: Daburu mk1
cardText: Start every contract with +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Daburu mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Dark Matter mk3
cardText: As 1 Action, discard a Damage 1 and a Damage 2 to deal 5 Damage.
wikiDescription: Dark Matter mk3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: When using this [[Ship Part]], you cannot search in the deck for required cards with {{crew/Zek Zarag}}.

name: Defender 5000
cardText: Discard any 2 cards as 1 Action to play as a Shield.
wikiDescription: Defender 5000 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You can discard any 2 [[Cards]] even if they are of different types.
The used [[Shield]] is treated as a [[Shield]] card.

name: Duo 1000
cardText: Your first Shield played counts as 2 Shields.
wikiDescription: Duo 1000 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: All types of [[Shield]] can trigger this, including [[Shield+]] (2 [[Hazards]] blocked and [[+2 Actions]]) and [[Shield×]] (4 [[Hazards]] blocked).
Both [[Shields]] trigger effects regarding [[Shields]], but only the first (actually played) [[Shield]] trigger effects regarding [[Shield]] cards.
“Play as“ cards, such as {{crew/[REDACTED]}}, also counts as a [[Shield]] card and can be played for free.

name: Emulator mk2
cardText: Play your first Shield without using an Action.
wikiDescription: Emulator mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Escape Jets E1
cardText: At the start of a contract, +1 Card if you have no Thrusters in your hand.
wikiDescription: Escape Jets E1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Flash
cardText: Your hand limit becomes 6 instead of 5.
wikiDescription: Flash is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: Draw 6 instead of 5 cards anytime you refresh your hand.

name: Jump Jets E2
cardText: Allies receive +1 Card at the start of a contract.
wikiDescription: Jump Jets E2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: MG Charge Core
cardText: As 1 Action, you may play a Damage 1 as a Damage 3. Then add a Miss to your discard.
wikiDescription: MG Charge Core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You cannot use “play as” cards to activate this [[Ship Part]]. This includes {{shipParts/SOS}} and {{shipParts/The Dauntless}}.
If there are no more [[Miss]] in the armory, you get nothing.

name: MG Phase core
cardText: If you play 2 or more Reactors, the requirement for Damage is 1 less.
wikiDescription: MG Phase core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: It is a one-time ability per contract.

name: MG Support Core
cardText: Play your first Damage card without using an Action.
wikiDescription: MG Support Core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG Warp
cardText: +2 Cards when you play your first Damage card.
wikiDescription: MG Warp is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: [TBC] {{crew/Crusse Parke}} cannot activate this [[Ship Part]] (as there is no [[Damage]] 4 card).

name: MG1 Kinetic
cardText: Trash a Damage 1 from your hand, requirement for Damage is 3 less.
wikiDescription: MG1 Kinetic is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You may trash a card even if there is no [[Damage]] requirement in a Contract.

name: MG1 Rail Gun
cardText: Requirement is 2 less for Damage if you don't play a Shield.
wikiDescription: MG1 Rail Gun is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG2 Laser Turrets
cardText: As 1 Action, discard 2 Damage 1 cards to deal 4 Damage.
wikiDescription: MG2 Laser Turrets is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: The 2 [[Damage 1]] cards played for this [[Ship Part]] cannot stack with {{crew/Kary Powak}}'s ability.

name: MG2 Quad Laser
cardText: At the start of a contract, +2 Cards if you have no Damage cards in your hand.
wikiDescription: MG2 Quad Laser is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Multi Stage M1
cardText: Once per contract, you may discard up to 3 Cards, allies then draw an equal number.
wikiDescription: Multi Stage M1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: Each ally draws the amount of [[Cards]] you discarded.
Aside from your turn, the Contract Leader decides the timing when you can choose to activate this [[Ship Part]].
You cannot stack this with {{shipParts/The Pursuer}}. Meaning you cannot discard up to 3 [[Cards]] to activate both [[Ship Parts]].

name: Predator mk1
cardText: All players can play 1 Damage 1 without using an Action.
wikiDescription: Predator mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: "All players" means those who participate in a contract that you are in.

name: Projector S2
cardText: +1 Card per Hazard Dice targeting you.
wikiDescription: Projector S2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Pulsor mk1
cardText: Allies start with an extra Action.
wikiDescription: Pulsor mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Replicator mk1
cardText: Discard 2 of the same card as 1 Action to play as a Shield, Thruster, Reactor, or Damage 1.
wikiDescription: Replicator mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Sapphire mk2
cardText: Requirement for Reactors is 1 less.
wikiDescription: Sapphire mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Swarm mk1
cardText: Discard a Damage 1 from your hand, +2 Actions.
wikiDescription: Swarm mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Symbiote 9000
cardText: Once per contract, you may block 1 HAzard by trashing a card from your hand.
wikiDescription: Symbiote 9000 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: [TBC] You may not trash a [[Card]] if there is no [[Hazard]] to negate.

name: The Clone Bay
cardText: Once per contract, you may play a Crew Member twice, Each use requires an Action.
wikiDescription: The Clone Bay is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You don't have to play the repeated [[Crew]] consecutively.

If you play [[Crews]] with [[IO Sphere]] stacked on them twice, 2 individual [[IO Sphere]] pools (of 3) are created. You may remove one [[IO Sphere]] from each pool per contract. This includes {{crew/IO MK8}}, {{crew/IO L1-ON}}, {{crew/IO-MG21}}, {{crew/IO Wraith 3000}}, {{crew/IO Mirage}}.
[Special] You can play {{crew/B3-AR}} again but cannot use it to retrieve the first {{crew/B3-AR}}.
[TBC] You cannot play a [[Crew]] from the Mercenary twice.

name: The Dauntless
cardText: Each Shield played also reduces the Damage requirement by 1.
wikiDescription: The Dauntless is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: The [[1 Damage]] does not trigger effects regarding [[Damage]] cards. This includes {{shipParts/MG Charge Core}}, {{shipParts/The Quantum Driver}}, {{shipParts/MG Warp}}, {{objectives/Fire Support}}, {{crew/Kary Powalk}}.

name: The Gatling Laser
cardText: Requirement for Damage is 1 less.
wikiDescription: The Gatling Laser is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Leech
cardText: As Mission Leader or ally, gain +1 Action for each ally.
wikiDescription: The Leech is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Pursuer
cardText: Once per contract, you may discard up to 3 Cards, then draw an equal number.
wikiDescription: The Pursuer is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You cannot stack this with {{shipParts/Multi Stage M1}}. Meaning you cannot discard up to 3 [[Cards]] to activate both [[Ship Parts]].

name: The Quantum Driver
cardText: Once per contract, play a Damage 1 as a Damage 3.
wikiDescription: The Quantum Driver is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Titan 3000
cardText: Requirement for Shields is 1 less.
wikiDescription: Titan 3000 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Twin Jets E4
cardText: Requirement for Thrusters is 1 less.
wikiDescription: Twin Jets E4 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Vector Jets E3
cardText: As Mission Leader, +1 Card at the start of a contract.
wikiDescription: Vector Jets E3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Doom
cardText: When you stay at base, gain 4 Credits instead of 1.
wikiDescription: Doom is a [[Ship Part]] from the 1st encounter micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Fission
cardText: Reactor cards don't require an Action to play.
wikiDescription: Fission is a [[Ship Part]] from the 1st encounter micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You may play a [[Reactor]] even if you have run out of [[actions]].
[[Cards]] that are played as a [[Reactor]] can activate Fission, e.g. [[Miss]] from {{shipParts/SOS}}.

name: Ghost
cardText: Your first Thruster played negates a Hazard Die.
wikiDescription: Ghost is a [[Ship Part]] from the 1st encounter micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Siphon
cardText: Gain an Action for each Hazard you block with a Shield.
wikiDescription: Siphon is a [[Ship Part]] from the 1st encounter micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: SOS
cardText: You may play Miss cards as a Shield, Thruster, Reactor, or Damage 1.
wikiDescription: SOS is a [[Ship Part]] from the 1st encounter micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: EM - TR4
cardText: Once per Contract, you may pay 2 Credits to draw a default loadout card from the supply to your hand.
wikiDescription: EM - TR4 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Shard micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Flare Shard
cardText: Gain +1 Credit for each of your Hazard blocked.
wikiDescription: Flare Shard is a [[Ship Part]] from the Shard micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: The [[Credits]] are rewarded after the contract has ended.
This applies to negated [[Hazards]].

name: Hypershift
cardText: Before playing cards, you may discard your entire hand. If you do, +5 Cards.
wikiDescription: Hypershift is a [[Ship Part]] from the Shard micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You may redraw indefinitely before playing any cards but this is not recommended.

name: Refractor
cardText: You may trash a Reactor to gain +4 Actions.
wikiDescription: Refractor is a [[Ship Part]] from the Shard micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Shard Spear
cardText: You may trash a Damage and a Card from your hand to add a Damage of one tier higher into your hand.
wikiDescription: Shard Spear is a [[Ship Part]] from the Shard micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Artifact 205-A
cardText: Prestige costs 1 less Faction Rep.
wikiDescription: Artifact 205-A is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Artifact 205-B
cardText: All Faction Rep rewards except Prestige cost 1 less, minimum 1.
wikiDescription: Artifact 205-B is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Comms Array C5
cardText: Trading Faction Rep is now a 2:1 ratio.
wikiDescription: Comms Array C5 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Envoy Shuttle
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a card to gain 1 Faction Rep in your lowest faction.
wikiDescription: Envoy Shuttle is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Flak Mine
cardText: You may roll 1 additional Hazard Die. Gain Faction Rep equal to Hazard rolled on that dice.
wikiDescription: Flak Mine is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: LR Targeting Core
cardText: You may spend any amount of Faction Rep to reduce the requirement for Damage an equal amount.
wikiDescription: LR Targeting Core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Proto Warning System
cardText: Once per contract, you may spend a Faction Rep to block 1 Hazard.
wikiDescription: Proto Warning System is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Pulse Exchange
cardText: Once per contract, you may spend a Faction Rep to gain +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Pulse Exchange is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Pulse Recycler
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a Reactor card from your hand to gain a Faction Rep.
wikiDescription: Pulse Recycler is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Radar Repeater
cardText: Once per contract, you may spend a Faction Rep to reduce a requirement by 1.
wikiDescription: Radar Repeater is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Aclimator 6050
cardText: You may choose to change 1 of the contract requirement type to Shields. This applies to everyone on the contract.
wikiDescription: Aclimator 6050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You have to change the requirements before any cards are played.
This can apply to head-to-head contracts.

name: Augmentor 2050
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a shield from your hand and add a Shield+ to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: Augmentor 2050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Catalyzer mk2
cardText: Once per contract, if you play 2 Reactor cards in a row, draw +2 Cards.
wikiDescription: Catalyzer mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Contributor mk2
cardText: Once per contract, you may give an ally a Reactor or a Thruster card from the supply into their hand.
wikiDescription: Contributor mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Devotion 3050
cardText: You may only buy this if you have 2 other Henko ship parts installed on your ship.
wikiDescription: Devotion 3050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: [Unruled] If this is acquired from other means than buying (e.g. gaining a bonus card), you can ignore the requirement of Henko ship parts.

name: Inverter mk2
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a Reactor from your hand and add a Reactor + to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: Inverter mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: IO Buffer 2050
cardText: Discard any Shield from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] to subtract 1 Shield requirement.
wikiDescription: IO Buffer 2050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: IO Cache 3050
cardText: Discard 2 cards from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 2 [IO] to block 1 Hazard.
wikiDescription: IO Cache 3050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: [Contradiction] One can essentially continually discard cards and gaining benefits from [[Ship Parts]], then refill the cards using {{shipParts/Hypershift}}.
Source contradicting above above ruling.

name: IO Exhaust E1
cardText: Add 1 [IO] to this ship part to draw +1 Card. When this card has 4 [IO] on it, remove this ship part.
wikiDescription: IO Exhaust E1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: IO Gen mk1
cardText: Add 1 [IO] to this card for every contract you complete. Remove 3 [IO] to play any card twice as 1 Action.
wikiDescription: IO Gen mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: IO Hotshot 1050
cardText: Twice per contract, you may roll a Hazard Dice and add 1 [IO]. Remove 1 [IO] to subtract 1 from any requirement.
wikiDescription: IO Hotshot 1050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: IO Hub mk2
cardText: Discard any Reactor from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 3 [IO] to add a Reactor+ to your discard.
wikiDescription: IO Hub mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: IO Pivot H2
cardText: After a contract, add 1 [IO] for every unblocked Hazard. Remove 1 [IO] to re-roll a Hazard Die targeting you.
wikiDescription: IO Pivot H2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: IO Spark mk1
cardText: Discard any Reactor from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] for +1 Action.
wikiDescription: IO Spark mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: IO Surge E2
cardText: Discard any Thruster from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] for +1 Card.
wikiDescription: IO Surge E2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Magnetite M1
cardText: Once per contract, each ally may choose to give you 1 card from their hand. You may trash it, or place it into your hand.
wikiDescription: Magnetite M1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: MG IO Charge
cardText: Add 1 [IO] to this card for every Hazard you block. Remvoe 2 [IO] to deal 1 Damage.
wikiDescription: MG IO Charge is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG IO Core
cardText: Discard 2 Damage cards from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] to deal 1 Damage.
wikiDescription: MG IO Core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG IO Overkill
cardText: Add 1 [IO] to this card every time you play a Damage 2. Remove 4 [IO] from this card to double your played Damage.
wikiDescription: MG IO Overkill is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG Overcharger
cardText: Once per contract, spend 1 additional Action when playing a Damage card to double it's Damage value.
wikiDescription: MG Overcharger is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG Raid
cardText: At the start of a contract, if there is a Miss in your hand, draw +2 Cards.
wikiDescription: MG Raid is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG Reformer
cardText: Once per contract, you must either trash a card or add 1 Miss to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: MG Reformer is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: Trashed cards from any other means do not fulfill this requirement.

name: MG Tractor Beam
cardText: When any other player trashes a card, you may add that card to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: MG Tractor Beam is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: [Unruled] Discarding and replacing cards from the Armory (using [[Credits]] or as a free action in the expansions) does not qualify for this [[Ship Part]].

name: MG Upgrade Core
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a Damage from your hand and add a Damage+ to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: MG Upgrade Core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Modulator T3
cardText: Once per contract, you and an ally may trade 1 card from your hands.
wikiDescription: Modulator T3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Phase Drive mk3
cardText: Once per contract, you may take a card form your hand and give it to an ally. They must put that card into their hand.
wikiDescription: Phase Drive mk3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Precari 4050
cardText: If there are 2 or more Hazard Dice targeting you, gain 1 Credit.
wikiDescription: Precari 4050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Staged Burst E3
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a Thruster from your hand and add a Thruster+ to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: Staged Burst E3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Tesselator mk1
cardText: When discarding your cards at the end of a contract, you may add 1 of the discarded cards to the top of your draw pile.
wikiDescription: Tesselator mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: The Arbiter
cardText: Discard 2 cards to add 1 [IO] to this card. Spend 3 [IO] to add a copy of any action card in your hand to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: The Arbiter is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Eternal
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a card from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remvove 4 [IO] for +1 Prestige.
wikiDescription: The Eternal is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Mill
cardText: Once per contract, discard the top card of your draw pile. If it isn't a Crew, add a copy of that card to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: The Mill is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Reclaimer
cardText: Anytime you trash a card, gain 2 Credits.
wikiDescription: The Reclaimer is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Tributor
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash 2 cards from your hand to subtract 3 from any 1 requirement
wikiDescription: The Tributor is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Thrust Tuner E2
cardText: When playing any Thruster, you may discard the first card drawn and draw an additional card.
wikiDescription: Thrust Tuner E2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Twin Probe E2
cardText: Once per contract, look at the top card of your draw pile. Return this card back to the top of your draw pile or discard it.
wikiDescription: Twin Probe E2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Underwriter 1050
cardText: If you fail a contract, gain 3 Credits.
wikiDescription: Underwriter 1050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: Head to head contracts would not be failed.

name: The Automaton
cardText: You may discard a Crew to reduce Crew contract requirement by 2.
wikiDescription: The Automaton is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Conductor
cardText: Once per turn, you may trash a card to gain +2 Actions.
wikiDescription: The Conductor is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Decoder
cardText: As Mission Leader, draw 5 contracts instead of 3 when you travel to a sector.
wikiDescription: The Decoder is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Icarus
cardText: Roll an additional Hazard Die every contract. All Thruster cards draw an additional card.
wikiDescription: The Icarus is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Initiator
cardText: Once per contract, discard 3 unique cards to reduce a contract requirement by 2.
wikiDescription: The Initiator is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Intrepid
cardText: When drawing an Event, draw 3 and choose 1. Return the other 2 to the bottom of the Event deck.
wikiDescription: The Intrepid is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Providence
cardText: At the start of a contract, draw and play the top card of your draw pile without using an Action.
wikiDescription: The Providence is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Resolute
cardText: If you are alone in a sector, reduce any contract requirement by 2.
wikiDescription: The Resolute is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Seer
cardText: Without changing the order, you may look at the top 2 cards in your draw pile at any time.
wikiDescription: The Seer is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Spectre
cardText: As Mission Leader or ally, you may travel freely to any sector including your current sector.
wikiDescription: The Spectre is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Pandorum Box
cardText: Draw +2 Cards everytime you roll a Double Hazard.
wikiDescription: Pandorum Box is a [[Ship Part]] from the Starfall expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Panic Drones
cardText: Subtract 1 from the result of every dice you roll.
wikiDescription: Panic Drones is a [[Ship Part]] from the Starfall expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Spark Root
cardText: Gain +1 Action every time an ally rolls a die.
wikiDescription: Spark Root is a [[Ship Part]] from the Starfall expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: STF Proto Field
cardText: Once per contract, you may re-roll any 1 of your dice that was rolled for any reason.
wikiDescription: STF Proto Field is a [[Ship Part]] from the Starfall expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Oracle
cardText: At the start of a contract, guess a card type. All allies +1 Card, gain 1 Credit for each matching card.
wikiDescription: The Oracle is a [[Ship Part]] from the Starfall expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: After guessing a card type, all allies draw one card. The one with this ship part then gains 1 [[Credit]] for each card drawn that matches the guessed type.

name: Bulwark 5040
cardText: Trash 1 Shield to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to block 2 Hazard.
wikiDescription: Bulwark 5040 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Fragmentor mk3
cardText: Trash 1 Reactor to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark matter card to reduce Reactor requirements by 2.
wikiDescription: Fragmentor mk3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Injector T9
cardText: Trash 1 Thruster to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to reduce Thruster requirements by 2.
wikiDescription: Injector T9 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: LR-42 AUTO
cardText: Trash 1 Damage to gain a Dark Matter card. As 1 Action, play 2 Dark Matter cards to deal 6 Damage.
wikiDescription: LR-42 AUTO is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Photon Cannon
cardText: Trash 1 Damage to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to deal 2 Damage.
wikiDescription: Photon Cannon is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Pod Coils
cardText: Trash 1 Thruster to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card for +3 Cards.
wikiDescription: Pod Coils is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Prism Canister
cardText: Trash 1 Reactor to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card for +3 Actions.
wikiDescription: Prism Canister is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Security Buffer
cardText: Trash 1 Shield to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to reduce Shield requirements by 2.
wikiDescription: Security Buffer is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: The Lattice
cardText: Trash a Miss to gain a Dark Matter card. For every Dark Matter card you play, +2 Credits.
wikiDescription: The Lattice is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Transponder
cardText: Trash a Miss to gain a Dark Matter card. As 1 Action, play 2 Dark Matter cards to gain an Objective card.
wikiDescription: The Transponder is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: MG Impact Warheads
cardText: At the start of a contract, roll a [[Moonrollers die]]. On [[Damage]], add a Damage 2 to your hand. On [[Wild]], you must trash a card.
wikiDescription: MG Impact Warheads is a [[Ship Part]] from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Octingency 8050
cardText: Roll a [[Moonrollers die]] for each Hazard Dice targeting you. Block a Hazard Die for each [[Wild]] or [[Shield]] rolled.
wikiDescription: Octingency 8050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Tertiary Drive mk1
cardText: Once per contract, roll 2 [[Moonrollers dice]]. Play 1 matching card without using an Action. Play any card on [[Wild]] or Crew on [[Extra die]].
wikiDescription: Tertiary Drive mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: The Hexahedron
cardText: Once per contract, roll a [[Moonrollers die]]. Reduce a matching contract requirement by 2. Any requirement on [[Wild]] or [[Extra die]].
wikiDescription: The Hexahedron is a [[Ship Part]] from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Trajectory Array K4
cardText: Once per contract, roll 4 [[Moonrollers dice]]. Allies gain +1 Actions for each [[Reactor]] and draw +1 Cards for each [[Thruster]].
wikiDescription: Trajectory Array K4 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: MG Phase core
cardText: If you play 2 or more Reactors, the requirement for Damage is 1 less.
wikiDescription: MG Phase core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: It is a one-time ability per contract.

name: MG Support Core
cardText: Play your first Damage card without using an Action.
wikiDescription: MG Support Core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG Warp
cardText: +2 Cards when you play your first Damage card.
wikiDescription: MG Warp is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: [TBC] {{crew/Crusse Parke}} cannot activate this [[Ship Part]] (as there is no [[Damage]] 4 card).

name: MG1 Kinetic
cardText: Trash a Damage 1 from your hand, requirement for Damage is 3 less.
wikiDescription: MG1 Kinetic is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You may trash a card even if there is no [[Damage]] requirement in a Contract.

name: MG1 Rail Gun
cardText: Requirement is 2 less for Damage if you don't play a Shield.
wikiDescription: MG1 Rail Gun is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG2 Laser Turrets
cardText: As 1 Action, discard 2 Damage 1 cards to deal 4 Damage.
wikiDescription: MG2 Laser Turrets is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: The 2 [[Damage 1]] cards played for this [[Ship Part]] cannot stack with {{crew/Kary Powak}}'s ability.

name: MG2 Quad Laser
cardText: At the start of a contract, +2 Cards if you have no Damage cards in your hand.
wikiDescription: MG2 Quad Laser is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Multi Stage M1
cardText: Once per contract, you may discard up to 3 Cards, allies then draw an equal number.
wikiDescription: Multi Stage M1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: Each ally draws the amount of [[Cards]] you discarded.
Aside from your turn, the Contract Leader decides the timing when you can choose to activate this [[Ship Part]].
You cannot stack this with {{shipParts/The Pursuer}}. Meaning you cannot discard up to 3 [[Cards]] to activate both [[Ship Parts]].

name: Predator mk1
cardText: All players can play 1 Damage 1 without using an Action.
wikiDescription: Predator mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: "All players" means those who participate in a contract that you are in.

name: Projector S2
cardText: +1 Card per Hazard Dice targeting you.
wikiDescription: Projector S2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Pulsor mk1
cardText: Allies start with an extra Action.
wikiDescription: Pulsor mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Replicator mk1
cardText: Discard 2 of the same card as 1 Action to play as a Shield, Thruster, Reactor, or Damage 1.
wikiDescription: Replicator mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Sapphire mk2
cardText: Requirement for Reactors is 1 less.
wikiDescription: Sapphire mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Swarm mk1
cardText: Discard a Damage 1 from your hand, +2 Actions.
wikiDescription: Swarm mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Symbiote 9000
cardText: Once per contract, you may block 1 HAzard by trashing a card from your hand.
wikiDescription: Symbiote 9000 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: [TBC] You may not trash a [[Card]] if there is no [[Hazard]] to negate.

name: The Clone Bay
cardText: Once per contract, you may play a Crew Member twice, Each use requires an Action.
wikiDescription: The Clone Bay is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You don't have to play the repeated [[Crew]] consecutively.

If you play [[Crews]] with [[IO Sphere]] stacked on them twice, 2 individual [[IO Sphere]] pools (of 3) are created. You may remove one [[IO Sphere]] from each pool per contract. This includes {{crew/IO MK8}}, {{crew/IO L1-ON}}, {{crew/IO-MG21}}, {{crew/IO Wraith 3000}}, {{crew/IO Mirage}}.
[Special] You can play {{crew/B3-AR}} again but cannot use it to retrieve the first {{crew/B3-AR}}.
[TBC] You cannot play a [[Crew]] from the Mercenary twice.

name: The Dauntless
cardText: Each Shield played also reduces the Damage requirement by 1.
wikiDescription: The Dauntless is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: The [[1 Damage]] does not trigger effects regarding [[Damage]] cards. This includes {{shipParts/MG Charge Core}}, {{shipParts/The Quantum Driver}}, {{shipParts/MG Warp}}, {{objectives/Fire Support}}, {{crew/Kary Powalk}}.

name: The Gatling Laser
cardText: Requirement for Damage is 1 less.
wikiDescription: The Gatling Laser is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Leech
cardText: As Mission Leader or ally, gain +1 Action for each ally.
wikiDescription: The Leech is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Pursuer
cardText: Once per contract, you may discard up to 3 Cards, then draw an equal number.
wikiDescription: The Pursuer is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You cannot stack this with {{shipParts/Multi Stage M1}}. Meaning you cannot discard up to 3 [[Cards]] to activate both [[Ship Parts]].

name: The Quantum Driver
cardText: Once per contract, play a Damage 1 as a Damage 3.
wikiDescription: The Quantum Driver is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Titan 3000
cardText: Requirement for Shields is 1 less.
wikiDescription: Titan 3000 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Twin Jets E4
cardText: Requirement for Thrusters is 1 less.
wikiDescription: Twin Jets E4 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Vector Jets E3
cardText: As Mission Leader, +1 Card at the start of a contract.
wikiDescription: Vector Jets E3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Base game. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Doom
cardText: When you stay at base, gain 4 Credits instead of 1.
wikiDescription: Doom is a [[Ship Part]] from the 1st encounter micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Fission
cardText: Reactor cards don't require an Action to play.
wikiDescription: Fission is a [[Ship Part]] from the 1st encounter micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You may play a [[Reactor]] even if you have run out of [[actions]].
[[Cards]] that are played as a [[Reactor]] can activate Fission, e.g. [[Miss]] from {{shipParts/SOS}}.

name: Ghost
cardText: Your first Thruster played negates a Hazard Die.
wikiDescription: Ghost is a [[Ship Part]] from the 1st encounter micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Siphon
cardText: Gain an Action for each Hazard you block with a Shield.
wikiDescription: Siphon is a [[Ship Part]] from the 1st encounter micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: SOS
cardText: You may play Miss cards as a Shield, Thruster, Reactor, or Damage 1.
wikiDescription: SOS is a [[Ship Part]] from the 1st encounter micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: EM - TR4
cardText: Once per Contract, you may pay 2 Credits to draw a default loadout card from the supply to your hand.
wikiDescription: EM - TR4 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Shard micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Flare Shard
cardText: Gain +1 Credit for each of your Hazard blocked.
wikiDescription: Flare Shard is a [[Ship Part]] from the Shard micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: The [[Credits]] are rewarded after the contract has ended.
This applies to negated [[Hazards]].

name: Hypershift
cardText: Before playing cards, you may discard your entire hand. If you do, +5 Cards.
wikiDescription: Hypershift is a [[Ship Part]] from the Shard micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You may redraw indefinitely before playing any cards but this is not recommended.

name: Refractor
cardText: You may trash a Reactor to gain +4 Actions.
wikiDescription: Refractor is a [[Ship Part]] from the Shard micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Shard Spear
cardText: You may trash a Damage and a Card from your hand to add a Damage of one tier higher into your hand.
wikiDescription: Shard Spear is a [[Ship Part]] from the Shard micro expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Artifact 205-A
cardText: Prestige costs 1 less Faction Rep.
wikiDescription: Artifact 205-A is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Artifact 205-B
cardText: All Faction Rep rewards except Prestige cost 1 less, minimum 1.
wikiDescription: Artifact 205-B is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Comms Array C5
cardText: Trading Faction Rep is now a 2:1 ratio.
wikiDescription: Comms Array C5 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Envoy Shuttle
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a card to gain 1 Faction Rep in your lowest faction.
wikiDescription: Envoy Shuttle is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Flak Mine
cardText: You may roll 1 additional Hazard Die. Gain Faction Rep equal to Hazard rolled on that dice.
wikiDescription: Flak Mine is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: LR Targeting Core
cardText: You may spend any amount of Faction Rep to reduce the requirement for Damage an equal amount.
wikiDescription: LR Targeting Core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Proto Warning System
cardText: Once per contract, you may spend a Faction Rep to block 1 Hazard.
wikiDescription: Proto Warning System is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Pulse Exchange
cardText: Once per contract, you may spend a Faction Rep to gain +1 Action.
wikiDescription: Pulse Exchange is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Pulse Recycler
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a Reactor card from your hand to gain a Faction Rep.
wikiDescription: Pulse Recycler is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Radar Repeater
cardText: Once per contract, you may spend a Faction Rep to reduce a requirement by 1.
wikiDescription: Radar Repeater is a [[Ship Part]] from the Binding ties expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Aclimator 6050
cardText: You may choose to change 1 of the contract requirement type to Shields. This applies to everyone on the contract.
wikiDescription: Aclimator 6050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: You have to change the requirements before any cards are played.
This can apply to head-to-head contracts.

name: Augmentor 2050
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a shield from your hand and add a Shield+ to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: Augmentor 2050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Catalyzer mk2
cardText: Once per contract, if you play 2 Reactor cards in a row, draw +2 Cards.
wikiDescription: Catalyzer mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Contributor mk2
cardText: Once per contract, you may give an ally a Reactor or a Thruster card from the supply into their hand.
wikiDescription: Contributor mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Devotion 3050
cardText: You may only buy this if you have 2 other Henko ship parts installed on your ship.
wikiDescription: Devotion 3050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: [Unruled] If this is acquired from other means than buying (e.g. gaining a bonus card), you can ignore the requirement of Henko ship parts.

name: Inverter mk2
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a Reactor from your hand and add a Reactor + to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: Inverter mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: IO Buffer 2050
cardText: Discard any Shield from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] to subtract 1 Shield requirement.
wikiDescription: IO Buffer 2050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: IO Cache 3050
cardText: Discard 2 cards from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 2 [IO] to block 1 Hazard.
wikiDescription: IO Cache 3050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: [Contradiction] One can essentially continually discard cards and gaining benefits from [[Ship Parts]], then refill the cards using {{shipParts/Hypershift}}.
Source contradicting above above ruling.

name: IO Exhaust E1
cardText: Add 1 [IO] to this ship part to draw +1 Card. When this card has 4 [IO] on it, remove this ship part.
wikiDescription: IO Exhaust E1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: IO Gen mk1
cardText: Add 1 [IO] to this card for every contract you complete. Remove 3 [IO] to play any card twice as 1 Action.
wikiDescription: IO Gen mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: IO Hotshot 1050
cardText: Twice per contract, you may roll a Hazard Dice and add 1 [IO]. Remove 1 [IO] to subtract 1 from any requirement.
wikiDescription: IO Hotshot 1050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: IO Hub mk2
cardText: Discard any Reactor from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 3 [IO] to add a Reactor+ to your discard.
wikiDescription: IO Hub mk2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: IO Pivot H2
cardText: After a contract, add 1 [IO] for every unblocked Hazard. Remove 1 [IO] to re-roll a Hazard Die targeting you.
wikiDescription: IO Pivot H2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: IO Spark mk1
cardText: Discard any Reactor from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] for +1 Action.
wikiDescription: IO Spark mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: IO Surge E2
cardText: Discard any Thruster from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] for +1 Card.
wikiDescription: IO Surge E2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Magnetite M1
cardText: Once per contract, each ally may choose to give you 1 card from their hand. You may trash it, or place it into your hand.
wikiDescription: Magnetite M1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: MG IO Charge
cardText: Add 1 [IO] to this card for every Hazard you block. Remvoe 2 [IO] to deal 1 Damage.
wikiDescription: MG IO Charge is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG IO Core
cardText: Discard 2 Damage cards from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] to deal 1 Damage.
wikiDescription: MG IO Core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG IO Overkill
cardText: Add 1 [IO] to this card every time you play a Damage 2. Remove 4 [IO] from this card to double your played Damage.
wikiDescription: MG IO Overkill is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG Overcharger
cardText: Once per contract, spend 1 additional Action when playing a Damage card to double it's Damage value.
wikiDescription: MG Overcharger is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG Raid
cardText: At the start of a contract, if there is a Miss in your hand, draw +2 Cards.
wikiDescription: MG Raid is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: MG Reformer
cardText: Once per contract, you must either trash a card or add 1 Miss to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: MG Reformer is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: Trashed cards from any other means do not fulfill this requirement.

name: MG Tractor Beam
cardText: When any other player trashes a card, you may add that card to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: MG Tractor Beam is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: [Unruled] Discarding and replacing cards from the Armory (using [[Credits]] or as a free action in the expansions) does not qualify for this [[Ship Part]].

name: MG Upgrade Core
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a Damage from your hand and add a Damage+ to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: MG Upgrade Core is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Modulator T3
cardText: Once per contract, you and an ally may trade 1 card from your hands.
wikiDescription: Modulator T3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Phase Drive mk3
cardText: Once per contract, you may take a card form your hand and give it to an ally. They must put that card into their hand.
wikiDescription: Phase Drive mk3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Precari 4050
cardText: If there are 2 or more Hazard Dice targeting you, gain 1 Credit.
wikiDescription: Precari 4050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Staged Burst E3
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a Thruster from your hand and add a Thruster+ to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: Staged Burst E3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Tesselator mk1
cardText: When discarding your cards at the end of a contract, you may add 1 of the discarded cards to the top of your draw pile.
wikiDescription: Tesselator mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: The Arbiter
cardText: Discard 2 cards to add 1 [IO] to this card. Spend 3 [IO] to add a copy of any action card in your hand to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: The Arbiter is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Eternal
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash a card from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remvove 4 [IO] for +1 Prestige.
wikiDescription: The Eternal is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Mill
cardText: Once per contract, discard the top card of your draw pile. If it isn't a Crew, add a copy of that card to your discard pile.
wikiDescription: The Mill is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Reclaimer
cardText: Anytime you trash a card, gain 2 Credits.
wikiDescription: The Reclaimer is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Tributor
cardText: Once per contract, you may trash 2 cards from your hand to subtract 3 from any 1 requirement
wikiDescription: The Tributor is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Thrust Tuner E2
cardText: When playing any Thruster, you may discard the first card drawn and draw an additional card.
wikiDescription: Thrust Tuner E2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Twin Probe E2
cardText: Once per contract, look at the top card of your draw pile. Return this card back to the top of your draw pile or discard it.
wikiDescription: Twin Probe E2 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Underwriter 1050
cardText: If you fail a contract, gain 3 Credits.
wikiDescription: Underwriter 1050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Overload expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: Head to head contracts would not be failed.

name: The Automaton
cardText: You may discard a Crew to reduce Crew contract requirement by 2.
wikiDescription: The Automaton is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Conductor
cardText: Once per turn, you may trash a card to gain +2 Actions.
wikiDescription: The Conductor is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Decoder
cardText: As Mission Leader, draw 5 contracts instead of 3 when you travel to a sector.
wikiDescription: The Decoder is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Icarus
cardText: Roll an additional Hazard Die every contract. All Thruster cards draw an additional card.
wikiDescription: The Icarus is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Initiator
cardText: Once per contract, discard 3 unique cards to reduce a contract requirement by 2.
wikiDescription: The Initiator is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Intrepid
cardText: When drawing an Event, draw 3 and choose 1. Return the other 2 to the bottom of the Event deck.
wikiDescription: The Intrepid is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Providence
cardText: At the start of a contract, draw and play the top card of your draw pile without using an Action.
wikiDescription: The Providence is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Resolute
cardText: If you are alone in a sector, reduce any contract requirement by 2.
wikiDescription: The Resolute is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Seer
cardText: Without changing the order, you may look at the top 2 cards in your draw pile at any time.
wikiDescription: The Seer is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Spectre
cardText: As Mission Leader or ally, you may travel freely to any sector including your current sector.
wikiDescription: The Spectre is a [[Ship Part]] from the Nomad expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Pandorum Box
cardText: Draw +2 Cards everytime you roll a Double Hazard.
wikiDescription: Pandorum Box is a [[Ship Part]] from the Starfall expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Panic Drones
cardText: Subtract 1 from the result of every dice you roll.
wikiDescription: Panic Drones is a [[Ship Part]] from the Starfall expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Spark Root
cardText: Gain +1 Action every time an ally rolls a die.
wikiDescription: Spark Root is a [[Ship Part]] from the Starfall expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: STF Proto Field
cardText: Once per contract, you may re-roll any 1 of your dice that was rolled for any reason.
wikiDescription: STF Proto Field is a [[Ship Part]] from the Starfall expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Oracle
cardText: At the start of a contract, guess a card type. All allies +1 Card, gain 1 Credit for each matching card.
wikiDescription: The Oracle is a [[Ship Part]] from the Starfall expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

ruleClarifications.description: After guessing a card type, all allies draw one card. The one with this ship part then gains 1 [[Credit]] for each card drawn that matches the guessed type.

name: Bulwark 5040
cardText: Trash 1 Shield to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to block 2 Hazard.
wikiDescription: Bulwark 5040 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Fragmentor mk3
cardText: Trash 1 Reactor to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark matter card to reduce Reactor requirements by 2.
wikiDescription: Fragmentor mk3 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Injector T9
cardText: Trash 1 Thruster to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to reduce Thruster requirements by 2.
wikiDescription: Injector T9 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: LR-42 AUTO
cardText: Trash 1 Damage to gain a Dark Matter card. As 1 Action, play 2 Dark Matter cards to deal 6 Damage.
wikiDescription: LR-42 AUTO is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Photon Cannon
cardText: Trash 1 Damage to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to deal 2 Damage.
wikiDescription: Photon Cannon is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Pod Coils
cardText: Trash 1 Thruster to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card for +3 Cards.
wikiDescription: Pod Coils is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.

name: Prism Canister
cardText: Trash 1 Reactor to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card for +3 Actions.
wikiDescription: Prism Canister is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: Security Buffer
cardText: Trash 1 Shield to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to reduce Shield requirements by 2.
wikiDescription: Security Buffer is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: The Lattice
cardText: Trash a Miss to gain a Dark Matter card. For every Dark Matter card you play, +2 Credits.
wikiDescription: The Lattice is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: The Transponder
cardText: Trash a Miss to gain a Dark Matter card. As 1 Action, play 2 Dark Matter cards to gain an Objective card.
wikiDescription: The Transponder is a [[Ship Part]] from the Dark Matter expansion. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: MG Impact Warheads
cardText: At the start of a contract, roll a [[Moonrollers die]]. On [[Damage]], add a Damage 2 to your hand. On [[Wild]], you must trash a card.
wikiDescription: MG Impact Warheads is a [[Ship Part]] from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. It was manufactured in the [[Magnomi]] sector.

name: Octingency 8050
cardText: Roll a [[Moonrollers die]] for each Hazard Dice targeting you. Block a Hazard Die for each [[Wild]] or [[Shield]] rolled.
wikiDescription: Octingency 8050 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. It was manufactured in the [[Henko]] sector.

name: Tertiary Drive mk1
cardText: Once per contract, roll 2 [[Moonrollers dice]]. Play 1 matching card without using an Action. Play any card on [[Wild]] or Crew on [[Extra die]].
wikiDescription: Tertiary Drive mk1 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. It was manufactured in the [[Komek]] sector.

name: The Hexahedron
cardText: Once per contract, roll a [[Moonrollers die]]. Reduce a matching contract requirement by 2. Any requirement on [[Wild]] or [[Extra die]].
wikiDescription: The Hexahedron is a [[Ship Part]] from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. It was manufactured in the [[Sorelia]] sector.

name: Trajectory Array K4
cardText: Once per contract, roll 4 [[Moonrollers dice]]. Allies gain +1 Actions for each [[Reactor]] and draw +1 Cards for each [[Thruster]].
wikiDescription: Trajectory Array K4 is a [[Ship Part]] from the Intrepid expansion from Moonrollers. It was manufactured in the [[Ventus]] sector.
